text: HOT Animation was a British animation studio owned by HiT Entertainment that specialised in stop-motion animation, cel animation, and computer animation. It was established on 1 April 1998 by Jackie Cockle, Brian Little, and Joe Dembinski. One of the famous productions was Bob the Builder. Category:Defunct companies of the United Kingdom Category:1998 establishments in England Category:2011 disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: HOT Animation
